dcterms:creator: H. P. Gupta
H. S. Chudgar
S. Mukherjee
T. Dutta
K. Sharma
dcterms:description: The training dataset contains 2900 sequences produced by five participants including experienced users and new users. The sequences acquired from the experienced users are collected at different days for capturing different variations in gesturing, such as variations in lengths of gestures and/or amplitudes of samples.
dcterms:title: Training dataset

dcterms:creator: H. P. Gupta
H. S. Chudgar
S. Mukherjee
T. Dutta
K. Sharma
dcterms:description: The testing dataset consists of 3100 hand gestures produced by seven participants. Each test sequence may contain two or more hand gestures.
dcterms:title: Testing dataset
